org.opendaylight.controller.sal.binding.api.data

Interface DataProviderService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BindingAwareService, DataBrokerService, DataChangePublisher<org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.binding.InstanceIdentifier<? extends org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.binding.DataObject>,org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.binding.DataObject,DataChangeListener>, DataModificationTransactionFactory<org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.binding.InstanceIdentifier<? extends org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.binding.DataObject>,org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.binding.DataObject>, DataProvisionService<org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.binding.InstanceIdentifier<? extends org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.binding.DataObject>,org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.binding.DataObject>, DataReader<org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.binding.InstanceIdentifier<? extends org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.binding.DataObject>,org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.binding.DataObject>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    MountProviderInstance
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractBindingSalProviderInstance, DataBrokerImpl, ForwardedBackwardsCompatibleDataBroker, MountPointManagerImpl.BindingMountPointImpl, RootBindingAwareBroker.RootSalInstance
    Deprecated. 
    Replaced by AsyncConfigurationCommitCoordinator service.

    @Deprecated
public interface DataProviderService
extends DataBrokerService, DataProvisionService<org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.binding.InstanceIdentifier<? extends org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.binding.DataObject>,org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.binding.DataObject>
    DataProviderService is common access point for BindingAwareProvider providers to access data trees described by the YANG model.

    • Method Detail

      • registerDataReader

        @Deprecated
org.opendaylight.yangtools.concepts.Registration registerDataReader(org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.binding.InstanceIdentifier<? extends org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.binding.DataObject> path,
                                                                             DataReader<org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.binding.InstanceIdentifier<? extends org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.binding.DataObject>,org.opendaylight.yangtools.yang.binding.DataObject> reader)
        Deprecated. Data Reader contract is removed from capabilities of MD-SAL and is replaced by replaced by org.opendaylight.controller.sal.core.spi.data.DOMStore contract.
        Registers a data reader for particular subtree of overal YANG data tree. Registered data reader is called if anyone tries to read data from paths which are nested to provided path.
        Parameters:
        path - Subpath which is handled by registered data reader
        reader - Instance of reader which
        Returns:
        Registration object for reader. Invoking Registration.close() will unregister reader.
